snippet.title: Tales From Space: Mutant Blobs Attack - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Mutant Blobs Attack is a sci-fi puzzle-platformer of cataclysmic proportions! You’re an ill-tempered blob that grows in size by swallowing everything in its path. Evolve from a tiny captive into a world-eating giant. Gain freakish abilities like magnetism, telekinesis, and rocket boosting. Use your mutant blob powers to devour the pathetic humans and all of civilization!

Now on Nintendo Switch! Purchase the game on the eShop here: https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/tales-from-space-mutant-blobs-attack-switch/
